Miami STD Testing Advised for Senior Community

Posted by admin on December 16th, 2011

A surprising demographic is in need of STD testing in Miami. According to CDC data, there is a rise in STDs—specifically chlamydia and syphilis—among the older population in South Florida. Data shows a 60% rise in these two STDs between 2005 and 2009. Nationwide, the increase for these two STDs for the 55 and older [...]
